# children

**Instance Property**

The tabs within a tab group.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var children: [UITab] { get set }
```

## Accessing tabs

- **tab(forIdentifier:)**: Returns a tab with a matching identifier, if any.
- **defaultChildIdentifier**: The identifier for the default subitem.
- **selectedChild**: The currently selected tab.

items.description: Returns a tab with a matching identifier, if any.
items.name: tab(forIdentifier:)

items.description: The identifier for the default subitem.
